text:
So I would like to introduce one of the lastest high-technologies which is robot waiters/waitresses.  It has taken the extraordinary technology skill---"Artificial Intelligence". Generally speaking it will be so rarely for promoting everyone to experience. Actually it's started using in Paris.  At the outset, someone wants to do some research about it or it might interest them, but it does be invested in a bunch of money.
However, this new technology has getting started to propagate through all over the world, it will be much more convenient. The reason why it is being so popular right now, firstly we won't waste our time anymore for interviewing the candidates. Meanwhile teaching them how to be a professional waitresses or waiters neither. Because the robots will replace human being to do all those things.  How? By inputting a program.
 There are two different kind of points that I would like to say. The avantages and disadvantages.
Certainly it could save the time for us. Normally on Google if we want to find out a restaurant, we compare the scores and the comments on below. But if all of the waiters or waitresses be replaced by the robots, it will no longer exist the service commentary.
On the other hand, if it'll be taken places. Meanwhile so many people will face unemployment also the shortage of occupational resources. The effects of our society, it will probably lose the balance of employment.
For resume, it will be more convenient in the future for sure. We still consider the consequences whether it will come true one day or not.
